issue.title: [Java][Gandiva] Fix JNI CI test for Gandiva
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12838](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12838). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Fix checkstyle problem with JNI CI test:
```java

Warning: src/main/java/org/apache/arrow/gandiva/expression/InNode.java:[62,3] (javadoc) JavadocMethod: Missing a Javadoc comment. Warning: src/main/java/org/apache/arrow/gandiva/expression/InNode.java:[68,3] (javadoc) JavadocMethod: Missing a Javadoc comment.
```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12838?focusedCommentId=17350760) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 10367
